backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing a feature deployment check involving frontend assets and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose in the Valentine app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook detailing steps to verify assets, retry deployment, and perform post-deployment validation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining theme, backgrounds, and component styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the scripts directory tracked in git.
frontend/scripts/retry-deploy-and-captur: Deployment script that logs environment info, verifies Gift 2 photos, and runs build/deploy steps with logging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing navigation between landing, gifts, and final steps.
frontend/src/components/BalloonRiseAnima: Animated balloon-rise effect that runs for 4 seconds then triggers a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/GiftCard.tsx: Gift card component with lock, open, and animation behaviors and a reveal area for content.
frontend/src/components/LayoutShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing themed background and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SafeGeneratedIma: Image loader that shows a styled fallback when a generated asset is missing or fails to load.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Static content config defining names, love note text, and lists of image filenames.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including creating AuthClient, loading stored identities, login handling, and exposing identity/status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing, as the app uses no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom CSS variables, Valentine‑themed colors, dark mode styles, utility classes, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/screens/FinalCelebrationScr: Displays the final celebration screen with a generated couple photo, large Valentine text, and animated heart icons.
frontend/src/screens/GiftsScreen.tsx: Implements a multi‑step interactive gifts screen with unlockable gifts, balloon animation, photo reveals, and a help dialog for customizing images.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Renders the initial Valentine question screen with a moving 'No' button and a static 'Yes' button triggering progression.
frontend/src/utils/randomPosition.ts: Generates a random top/left position for an element within container bounds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and Valentine‑themed design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the current Valentine website project state, including features, architectural notes, and issues with Gift 2 photo assets not displaying. Marks the file as a fix request and outlines required static asset updates for user-provided photos.
